text: Roger Anthony Lloyd-Pack (8 February 1944 - 16 January 2014) was an English actor. He was best known for his roles as Trigger in the television shows Only Fools and Horses, The Vicar of Dibley and The Old Guys, and his role in the movie Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire. Lloyd-Pack died from pancreatic cancer on 16 January 2014. He died at his home in Kentish Town in London. He was aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * * BBC biography * BBC interview about appearing in Doctor Who Category:1944 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Islington
title: Roger Lloyd-Pack
